title: kavalai nInga
sahitya:
kavalai nInga oru karuNai illaiyO en


anupallavi

  bhava vinaigaLIlE paTTuppaTTu nALum paritavikkum uyir paribhAgam eidik-


caraNam    sattum asattumAm sakalAn mAmara sadguruvAgavE dayai sheidu vandu mukti 
inbam trarumbhaktiyinbam tandu mummalattaip-pOkki mUDhanEnum ALAik-
